Instruction: 'Peel the eggplant and slice it into 1/2-inch thick rounds.'
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper to make the marinade.'
'Brush both sides of the eggplant slices with the marinade.'
Grill the eggplant slices for 4-5 minutes per side, or until tender and grill marks appear.'
'Remove from the grill and transfer to a serving platter.'
'Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.'
